ResearchProjectDef.label: 128mm Pak 44
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 128mm Pak 44 Anti-tank field gun. Field guns are cheaper and easier to build, but has lower hit points.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 90mm M26
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 90mm M3 Gun mounted in a turret from M26 Pershing. Has an internal ammo storage of 70 rounds. Tank turrets has much higher hit points but has higher building cost and work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 100mm T54
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 100mm D-10T Gun mounted in a turret from T54. Has an internal ammo storage of 34 rounds. Tank turrets has much higher hit points but has higher building cost and work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 106mm M40
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 2x 106mm M40 Recoilless Rifle mounted in a circular mount from R3 IFV. Does not have ammo storage. Tank turrets has much higher hit points but has higher building cost and work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 105mm Leopard 1A5
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 105mm L7A3 L/52 rifled gun mounted on a Leopard 1A5 turret. Has an internal ammo storage of 55 rounds. Fires an APFSDS (Armor Piercing Fin-Stabilized Discarding Sabot) round that has a very high armor penetration value. Tank turrets has much higher hit points but has higher building cost and work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned large cannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to research and build the unmanned variant of large cannons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned 6Pdr Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: An unmanned version of 6 Pounder Cannon Turret which has a reduced max range and reduced accuracy.
